org.tantalum.net

Class StaticWebCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tantalum.storage.StaticCache
      • org.tantalum.net.StaticWebCache

  • public final class StaticWebCache
extends StaticCache
    A cache of remote http contents backed by local flash memory storage

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StaticWebCache.GetAnywhereTask
      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_ANYWHERE operation on a Worker thread in the background.
      class  StaticWebCache.GetWebTask
      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_WEB operation on a Worker thread in the background.
      static class  StaticWebCache.HttpTaskFactory
      If you override this default implementation, you can add custom header parameters to the HTTP request and act on custom header fields such as cookies in the HTTP response.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_HTTP_GETTER_FACTORY

        public static final StaticWebCache.HttpTaskFactory DEFAULT_HTTP_GETTER_FACTORY
        An object which creates HttpGetter or a subclass such as HttpPutter each time a web cache needs to fill after a local cache miss. If you override this class, you can create your own replacement which handles cookies, security, server response validation and other custom issues for getting data from a specific HTTP server. For example, if you need to check what you get from the server before deciding it is a valid response and caching it locally, you should provide a custom implementation.

      • GET_LOCAL

        public static final int GET_LOCAL
        Get from the local cache only- do not request from a web server
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GET_ANYWHERE

        public static final int GET_ANYWHERE
        Get from the local cache if available, otherwise GET from a web server
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GET_WEB

        public static final int GET_WEB
        GET from the web, overriding and replacing any value currently stored in the local cache
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getWebCache

        public static StaticWebCache getWebCache(char priority,
                         DataTypeHandler handler)
        Get existing or create a new local cache of a web service. This uses the default StaticWebCache.HttpTaskFactory is to perform HTTP GET or HTTP PUT with no cookies and minimal validation of the server responses. You can change this by providing your own custom override of this class. A common need for this changing this default behavior is if the HTTP server you are caching does not return an HTTP header error code but rather gives an unexpected response body that you need to watch for before deciding to cache the response.
        Parameters:
        priority -
        handler -
        Returns:

      • getWebCache

        public static StaticWebCache getWebCache(char priority,
                         DataTypeHandler handler,
                         StaticWebCache.HttpTaskFactory httpTaskFactory)
        Get existing or create a new local cache of a web service.
        Parameters:
        priority - - must be unique in your application. Lower numbers or letters are garbage collected first when flash storage runs out.
        handler - - an object for converting from the byte[] format returned by the web server or stored in local flash memory into Object form. The most common handlers use cases return something like a String, JSONModel, XMLModel or Image.
        httpTaskFactory - - A custom override of StaticWebCache.HttpTaskFactory. A common need for this is changing this default data validation behavior behavior if the HTTP server you are caching does not return an HTTP header error code but rather gives an unexpected response body that you need to watch for before deciding to cache the response.
        Returns:

      • getAsync

        public Task getAsync(java.lang.String key,
            byte[] postMessage,
            int priority,
            int getType,
            Task chainedTask)
        Retrieve one item from the cache using the method specified in the getType parameter. The call returns immediately, is executed concurrently on a worker thread, and code in the Task will be executed automatically on a Worker and optionally also the UI thread after the getAsync operation completes. Normal use case is to specify the method StaticWebCache.GET_ANYWHERE. This attempts getAsync in the following order: 1. RAM if available: Task return is fast but still asynchronous 2. Local flash storage (RMS or database depending on the platform) if available: may take several milliseconds, or longer if the Worker task queue is long and you do not specify high priority. 3. web: may take several seconds for a HTTP response which is then cached locally automatically. The getAsync() call returns immediately, is executed concurrently on a worker thread, and code in the Task will be executed automatically on a Worker and optionally also the UI thread if UITask after the getAsync operation completes.
        Parameters:
        key - - The web service location to HTTP_GET the cacheable data
        postMessage - - HTTP POST will be used if this value is non-null, otherwise HTTP GET is used
        priority - - Worker.HIGH_PRIORITY, Worker.NORMAL_PRIORITY, or Worker.LOW_PRIORITY
        getType - - StaticWebCache.GET_ANYWHERE, StaticWebCache.GET_WEB or StaticWebCache.GET_LOCAL
        chainedTask - - your Task which is given the data returned and executed after the getAsync operation.
        Returns:
        a new Task containing the result
